snippet.title: CATO - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Cat + Toast = CATO! 🍞🐈🧩#indiegame #platformer #cats 

We are Team Woll, a duo who created the indie puzzle platformer game CATO inspired by the perpetual motion meme of buttered cats.

In CATO, you need to control both the cat and the buttered toast separately. When they combine, they become CATO buttered cat, a capable of infinite rolling and floating! Use these abilities to solve various puzzles at different levels. 

We have released the latest Steam Demo, which offers the first hour of gameplay. We will also participate in the June New Releases Festival with a developer livestream. The full version is expected to be released this fall, so be sure to add it to your wishlist!
